message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be extremely valuable to you. It's something that I'm confident will significantly benefit your business. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,150,000. I know it's a significant investment, but I'm sure you'll see the immense value it holds. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to purchase it for $1,000,000. Let me know your thoughts.
